duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service and educate consumers throughout the loan or pawn process.
Assist in customer account management, including payments, monitoring, and managing appointments.
Work to meet performance standards by leveraging business opportunities, obtaining referrals, and participating in events.
Develop customer relationships to build new business, maintain store profitability, and further brand loyalty.
Provide support, coaching, and development to Customer Service Representatives to improve the team’s potential.
Maintain customer information in the Point of Sale system with accuracy and integrity.
Help ensure compliance with Company policies and local, state, and federal laws and regulations.
Utilize personal vehicle to complete bank deposits and other Company business throughout the workday.
Work efficiently in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple challenging tasks to meet performance standards.
Utilize strong interpersonal skills to communicate with customers and Team Members at all levels.
Maintain a full-time work schedule with regular in-person attendance, including limited Saturday hours.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Associate degree preferred)
